channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- GE PACSystems RX3i CPE305/310 version 9.20 and prior RX3i CPE330 version 9.21 and prior RX3i CPE 400 version 9.30 and prior PACSystems RSTi-EP CPE 100 all versionsPACSystems CPU320/CRU320 RXi all versions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- GE PACSystems RX3i CPE305/310 version 9.20 and prior RX3i CPE330 version 9.21 and prior RX3i CPE 400 version 9.30 and prior PACSystems RSTi-EP CPE 100 all versionsPACSystems CPU320/CRU320 RXi all versions

item.description: In GE PACSystems RX3i CPE305/310 version 9.20 and prior, RX3i CPE330 version 9.21 and prior, RX3i CPE 400 version 9.30 and prior, PACSystems RSTi-EP CPE 100 all versions, and PACSystems CPU320/CRU320 RXi all versions, the device does not properly validate input, which could allow a remote attacker to send specially crafted packets causing the device to become unavailable.
